English.Text: Your attach√© hits it off with the harbourmaster, presenting you (not entirely falsely) as a fellow port official sympathetic to the Pyrphorian problem in the region. "I am sick of it," says the Montoyan, "whenever they come here it is a nightmare for us! If you take will action, it will be my pleasure to assist." Out on the sun-baked rooftop he points upriver. "There, at the casona." A large verdant ranch wavers in the distance, the sanctuary of the Pyrphorians.
